remarks: The morphism part of a functor is a function on homsets.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
funcixp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` D ) $.
funcixp.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` D ) $.
funcixp.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` E ) $.
funcixp.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( D Func E ) G ) $.
funcf2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
funcf2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
funcf2 $p |- ( ph -> ( X G Y ) : ( X H Y ) --> ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
